definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: chain (on from Lag BN 89);—abs. ´[[עֲשֵׂה הָר]]: Ez Eze 7:23, i.e. for captives, but very dub.; Co [[עָרׂה וּבָקוֹק]], Krae [[עשֵׁׂי הַבַּתּוֹק]] (´[[ב]]: = As. butâḳu, obstruction); hence perh. also pl. cstr. [[רֵתּוּקוֹת זׇהָב]] 1Ki 6:21 Qr (Kt [[רתיקות]]), chains of gold before the [[דְּבִיד]] in temple.
